titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Gordon F. Wickes student notebook

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Student from St. Johns, Michigan, 1914 graduate of the University of Michigan College of Engineering. After graduation worked as a resident engineer in Colorado.
archdesc.scopecontent: Course work, exercises, problems, notes, and exams from civil and mechanical engineering courses. Also correspondence, notes and engineering surveys done in Colorado around Lake Bradford and Cucharas after graduation as a resident engineer.
